#yDrive #yPoints are used to fuel Sora's #yDrive #yForms and other abilities.
You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time. NL You cannot gain #yDrive #yPoints while in a #yDrive #yForm.

You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time. NL You cannot gain #yDrive #yPoints while in a #yDrive #yForm. NL Every attack played draws 1 card. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time. NL You cannot gain #yDrive #yPoints while in a #yDrive #yForm. NL Whenever you play a card, gain #b2 Block. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.
If the last card played also had #yCombo, trigger this cards #yCombo effect.
If you are in #yValor #yForm trigger this cards #yStrong effect.
If you are in #yWisdom #yForm trigger this cards #yWise effect.
Whenever you would normally gain #yDrive #yPoints while in a #yDrive #yForm, they will instead be saved and then gained on exiting your current #yDrive #yForm.
Trigger this card's #ySpell effect once if discarding from your hand, trigger it twice if discarded from #yScrying.
